an5.8:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.8:1.3: Assaddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.8:1.4: Ahiriko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.8:1.5: Anottappi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.8:1.6: Kusito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.8:1.7: Duppanno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.8:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu cavati, nappatitthati saddhamme.
an5.8:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu na cavati, patitthati saddhamme.
an5.8:2.3: Saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patitthati saddhamme.
an5.8:2.4: Hirima, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patitthati saddhamme.
an5.8:2.5: Ottappi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patitthati saddhamme.
an5.8:2.6: Araddhaviriyo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patitthati saddhamme.
an5.8:2.7: Pannava, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patitthati saddhamme.
an5.8:2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu na cavati, patitthati saddhamme”ti.
